snippet.title: Shoot On Sight – 1st Trailer
snippet.description:
Welcome to Shoot On Sight, an isometric, action, tactical, online PVP game available for PC

#game #indie #shootonsight 


Join the Shoot On Sight community on Discord and follow us on Twitter for the latest updates and news. 
Links are available in the video description below:

 Discord ► https://discord.com/invite/P4CKMjGstY
 Twitter ► https://twitter.com/shootsightgame
 Website ► https://shootonsightgame.com
